channel.title: Leaving this forum
channel.description:
Hello mates,
I have been thinking of leaving this forum for quite some time now. I don't really have time, anymore, for the Internet or mainly this forum. A lot of people are leaving or were leaving so I decided that I should think about leaving for good. However, this forum is like my e-home, and I enjoy meeting new people and helping out whenever I can. I wanted to someday become a community member and then a moderator.
Over the summer, I would have spent over 4 hours on this site, but now that school has started, I rarely log on. I try to log on at least once a day but sometimes can’t. I have many reasons for leaving this site: I get too much homework everyday, and am working on it until 12 am. I have been getting moody because I only have 3-4 hours of sleep every night. :mad: I don't spend time with family anymore, and can't focus on my homework because I want to log on here.
I can't think of anything else to say right now because I am really tired. Sorry if I don't have proper punctuation, I can't really be bothered right now. So I am considering leaving, but am not absolutely sure that I want to.
Have a good weekend.
Your friend, Leader

item.title: Leaving this forum
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Oh for god sake just leave! Why doesnt everyone just fricken leave! I’m doing my hoemwork right now and this site isnt distracting me… is it?

OMFG pl0x s4y teh byes to me caws im leavin!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Leaving this forum
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

[quote=“irfan786, post:8, topic:18324”]How can I not consider you a friend? Thats like me not considering that chicken is good. ;).
Msn pl0x?[/quote]

Leader91@hotmail.com is my msn. I would prefer, if you have aim, that you add me to that instead of msn. My aim is leader91.

Thanks again,
Leader[br][size=1]Posted at: October 15, 2006, 11:26:48 AM[/size][hr]What makes things worse is that I got accepted into this Science and Engineering Program. I spent three hours writing the entry essay, and then had to do an interview, but now I am in it. I thought I wasn’t going to be chosen. Now I have to wake up even earlier. So much to do, so little time.

Read full topic

My god.

ok, this is one goodbye thread that i approve of

gl and have fun

item.title: Leaving this forum
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

School is more important than the internet, even if it is like your e-home. This may sound harsh, but if this is getting in the way of your family and making it hard to concentrate, you need to take a break.

You can always come back and visit, besides, sometimes all you need is a break. Its not like you have to leave for good.

Anyways, if you do decide to leave, I’ll miss you. I always see you helping out around the forums, and its good to have somebody like that in a community, so I’m sure a lot of people will miss you.

-Weibs.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.description:
@leader wrote:

irfan786:

Aww, not another friend :(. So far 2 good friends of mine have left, not you too :(.

Thanks for considering me your friend. I doubt I will have time during winter, I would probably get more homework. Finals is around that time.
